data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Anjaw, Arunachal Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Anjaw, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Anjaw.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Anjaw.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Anjaw who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kachin people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Anjaw, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Anjaw, Arunachal Pradesh, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary:
the county of Anjaw, Arunachal Pradesh, India has a population of 1,900.

We estimate Anjaw has 21 people who might know Jesus, 23 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,856 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Anjaw, Arunachal Pradesh, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
